import React from "react"; import "../styleSheet.css"; const newTaxCalculation = (data) => { let FirstSlab = 250000; let SecondSlab = 500000; let Surcharge1 = 5000000; let Surcharge2 = 10000000; let ctcValue = data.ctcValue; let rentValue = data.rentValue; let deduction80C = data.deduction80C; let deduction80D = data.deduction80D; let stanDard = data.stanDard; let metroorNot = data.metroorNot; let basicSalaryValue = (ctcValue * 50) / 100; }; const NewTax = ({ data }) => { const calculation = newTaxCalculation(data); return (

Tax payabe as per new slab

Tax slabs Tax Rate Applicable Amount Balance Amount Tax Amount
0-2,50,000 0%
2,50,001-5,00,000 5%
5,00,001-7,50,000 10%
7,50,000 - 10,00,000 15%
10,00,001 - 12,50,000 20%
12,50,001 - 15,00,000 25%
Above 15,00,001 30%
Sub Total
Surcharge
Health and Edu Cess
Tax Credit (Sec 87A)
Total Tax payable
); }; export default NewTax;
